subject: [Bank Alert] Your Account Has Been Locked
body:
We detected suspicious activity on your account. Click the link below to verify your identity or your account will be permanently disabled in 24 hours:
http://secure-online-banking-verify-id.com

subject: Delivery Attempt Failed
body:
Hello! We attempted to deliver your package today but nobody was home. Please re-confirm your address details here to schedule redelivery:
https://dhl-verify-delivery-info.com

subject: Welcome to Our Security Newsletter
body: Hi there! You’re receiving this official security tips newsletter because you opted in. This message is informational only — no links to click and no actions required.

subject: Password Expiring Today
body:
Your company password expires in 1 hour. Reset it now:
http://it-admin-security-reset.co

Failure to reset will cause immediate account suspension.

subject: Receipt for Your Purchase
body: Thanks for your order! Attached is your official receipt. If you did not make this purchase, please contact support through the official website or app — do not reply to this email with sensitive info.

subject: Payroll Confirmation Needed Before 5PM
body:
Hi, this is HR. We're updating salaries for this cycle. Please log in and confirm your banking details immediately so we don’t delay your payment:
https://internal-payroll-update.com/login

subject: Invoice #88213 Overdue
body:
Good afternoon,

Your invoice #88213 is now 7 days overdue. Please use the secure link below to settle the balance:
http://accounts-payable-clearing.com

Failure to pay may result in service interruption.

subject: New Remote Work Policy Update
body:
Hi team,

Please review the attached PDF with updates to our remote work and flexible hours policy effective next month.

– HR & Operations

subject: Urgent: Are You On-Site?
body:
Hey, are you available? I need you to buy 4 gift cards and send me the codes ASAP. I can't call right now, but this is confidential. Reply when done.

– Your Manager

subject: University IT Notice: Mailbox Almost Full
body:
Your inbox storage is at 97%. Increase your quota here:
http://student-it-helpdesk-mailupgrade.edu

Failure to do so will result in loss of recent messages.
